name: A Drug Called Control
description:
Control is an addictive and limited resource, but you must use the lack of control to your advantage to succeed.

Controls:
Ctrl - Eat Pill
WASD - Move
R - Reset Level
L - Enter Level Select

Eating a pill will grant you a certain amount of moves, and when your moves run out, you will continue in the same direction until you hit a wall or eat another pill.

Made for the GameMaker's Toolkit Game Jam 2020
Luke Simpson - Coding
Jon Molnar - Coding and Level Design
Philip Simpson - Art and Level Design

Made entirely in 48 hours
